hero.title: The VPN That Always Connects
hero.subtitle: macOS AppStore Hong Kong Tools Top 3

features.title: One-Click "Quick Connect", Silky Smooth
features.description: LetsVPN uses a new kernel and AI smart connect to automatically match you with the fastest global network node. Just tap "Start Quick Connect" and enjoy a silky smooth surfing experience within 3 seconds.

features.title: Reach Anywhere, No Limits
features.description: LetsVPN supports global network resources, allowing unrestricted and unrecorded access to any resource, while using advanced technology to erase any traces, truly enabling you to reach anywhere.

features.title: Industry Leader, Secure and Worry-Free
features.description: LetsVPN is a long-term leader in the AppStore tools category, independently security audited by Google, and certified by App Esteem for international network security. While providing network freedom, it does not store any personal information, strictly protecting your privacy.

features.title: Use As You Go, Never Locked In
features.description: The only renowned VPN globally daring to offer short-term memberships. Prioritizing user rights alongside security and stability, subscribe when you need it, and never worry about service shutdowns or being locked into long contracts.

features.title: Unlimited Platforms, Seamless Connection
features.description: LetsVPN supports all mainstream devices on the market. A single account allows shared membership across multiple devices, supporting simultaneous online access for seamless transitions across different usage scenarios.

features.title: Live Customer Support, Always Connected
features.description: LetsVPN offers 24-hour online service, with 100+ live customer service agents and network engineers on standby to safeguard your internet experience, truly providing on-call, always-connected VIP service.

reviews.name: MangoFlavorFairy
reviews.title: Individual User
reviews.text: LetsVPN is great! The interface is simple and easy to use. Connection is stable for videos and games. Love using it for Instagram!

reviews.name: Ms. Wang
reviews.title: Designer, Shanghai
reviews.text: After using LetsVPN, my internet speed significantly improved. No more buffering for videos! Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Mr. Li
reviews.title: Project Manager, Beijing
reviews.text: The interface is clean and user-friendly, one-click connection is very convenient. Many global nodes and professional customer service.

reviews.name: Xiao Zhang
reviews.title: Student, Guangzhou
reviews.text: Security and stability are excellent, and the price is reasonable. Very friendly for students like us.

reviews.name: Anonymous User
reviews.title: Gaming Enthusiast
reviews.text: Playing on international game servers has much lower latency now, thumbs up! Hope for more promotions.

reviews.name: User Six
reviews.title: Tester
reviews.text: This is the sixth review to test display on desktop.

hero.title: Earn <1>Cash</1> by Referring
hero.description: Refer one person to install and earn up to 5 CNY. Get an additional 100 CNY weekly bonus. Withdraw to Alipay or bank card. No private info like ID needed for registration. Easy-to-follow tutorial!
hero.scanPrompt: Scan to become a promoter now

infoCards.title: Earn 5 CNY Per Referral
infoCards.description: Each person has a unique referral ID. When a new user enters your ID during their first installation, it counts as a successful referral. The process is extremely simple.

infoCards.title: Extra 100 CNY Weekly Bonus
infoCards.description: When your weekly referral count reaches 100, you'll earn an additional 100 CNY bonus on top of the basic referral rewards.

infoCards.title: Weekly Settlement, Easy Withdrawal
infoCards.description: No need to provide private information like ID cards. All earnings can be withdrawn to Alipay or bank cards.

posts.title: LetsVPN Wishes Global Chinese Users a Happy Year of the Snake!
posts.summary: As the old year gives way to the new, the LetsVPN team wishes you a prosperous Year of the Snake, with soaring success, abundant wealth, and happiness!
